      • addMeasurement

        public boolean addMeasurement(double d,
                              java.time.LocalDateTime ldt,
                              java.lang.String string)
                       throws edu.ma02.core.exceptions.SensorException,
                              edu.ma02.core.exceptions.MeasurementException
        Adds a new measurement
        Specified by:
        addMeasurement in interface edu.ma02.core.interfaces.ISensor
        Parameters:
        d - measurement value
        ldt - measurement date
        string - measurement unit for which the value was recorded
        Returns:
        1.true if the measurement was inserted in the collection

        2.false if the measurement already exists.

        Throws:
        edu.ma02.core.exceptions.SensorException - if the @param unit is not compatible with the unit pre-defined for the sensor
        edu.ma02.core.exceptions.MeasurementException - if the value is -99 or any parameter is invalid
